metadata.name: Poisonous Ignorance
metadata.description:
Genesis piece from what will probably be my most personal NFT collection ever.

Poisonous Ignorance talks about how prejudice or sheer ignorance can hurt when the other party is unaware of your challenges even if they know you're a disabled person. Some of the most heard phrases by our community have been written down in the piece.

About The Darkness in M.E.

I suffer from ME/CFS, one of the so called "invisible illnesses" which main symptoms are very severe fatigue that doesn't go away with rest and worsens through the years, POTS, severe brainfog and cognitive issues, hypersinsitivity to sound, light, chemicals and foods and it develops into chronic depression and anxiety. There's no known cure or treatment for it.

ME/CFS comes with lots of ailments and social challenges, so with this collection I'll be trying to convey how they all feel as well as i can ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçü©π

Cintia
